extendedInfo.description: "Amazing App Allows You to Transform Your Device in A Universal Remote" - AppEggs.comgPad is a wireless touchpad, configurable remote and keyboard for PC/Mac. Control you computers via wifi, usb or bluetooth (bluetooth in free version is beta and temporar). Similar to Gmote, remote droid, XBMC, unified remote,... but now, you can configure and share your own remote's!Create layouts for all your applications, organise your shortcuts, expand your keyboard, automate key sequences,â¦ Any of your ideas!Create/share/download gPads for:* Presentation (powerpoint, google docs, ...)* Media players (Winamp, iTunes, media player, any music program, ...)* Graphical (Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, 3D, video, vlc,  ...)* Media center, Windows, Mac, XBMC, Spotify, Frontpad, eyeTV, mediaportal,...* Keypad and keyboard extensions* Game cheat codes or key sequences* Any of your ideas! Extend your keyboard now!To use gPad, download the server on your pc (www.gpad.mobi) and get started!To have unlimited acces to all functionalities and remove the admob banner, you can buy our PRO version via the android market or Paypal. Enjoy!For more information about the developers, visit us on www.MOBiSTERS.mobi or follow us on facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/MOBiSTERS/145275582205673. Post your findings and ideas on Facebook and they may become real!

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: I use it for conducting quizzes, highly customisable, innovative and easy to use app. Simply great!!! (only if you know how to use it)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Remarkable
reviews.comment: It\'s sad that there are so many dullards giving a low rating based on their own minor pet peeve. Giving it 1 star because it doesn\'t support linux? That\'s just evil-stupid. This is a remarkable app, & in conjunction with AutoHotKey, will give you godlike powers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good idea, bad execution
reviews.comment: The idea is a good one, but it\'s way too buggy. Randomly doesn\'t work, messes up with no apparent reason. Still, when it does work, it\'s rather smooth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Workd ONCE. Never again
reviews.comment: On ATRIX 4g it installed and opened once okay. Now it just goes to a black screen when i open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Linux support
reviews.comment: Useless to me without Linux support. Really terrible to distribute software for devices running a Linux kernel that can communicate with Windows and/or Mac but not other Linux-based systems.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does not work for Galaxy s2
reviews.comment: DONT WAST YOUR TIME DOESNT WORK .......it looked nice but will not pull the ip address off the computer even when you put it in still dont work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Brilliant app, plenty of add-on pads which are tailored to your needs!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: works fine :)
reviews.comment: wifi works fine. although via USB doesn\'t, still gonna figure out why. the UI suddenly closes, but the backend app still works. thanks for the amazing dev :)
reviews.author: Christian Jarder

reviews.title: Updated comment: awesome!
reviews.comment: Upd8d comment: bluetooth works amazingly! Suggestion for new feature: connectivity through wifi direct or through phone\'s portable wifi. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: This is one of the top 5 apps for android ever for me and it\'s the best touchpad app you\'ll ever find. Download now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Server install site down
reviews.comment: This app needs you to run software on your computer to work. The website to download that software is dead. Thus, this app is useless. 3/25/12 - Dinc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Computer remote is genius! Dont need that wireless mouse and keyboard now cause i have one in my phone. Thanks mobisters!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Trial version
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t indicate it is a trial version. I have no idea what can I use on it. Plus can\'t connect to computer via usb after finished their instruction on site. When through faq, useless. Still doesn\'t work. Not going to buy it when trial is not even working. Computer program interface was horrible. Clicked connect via usb there is no indication of what I have clicked or even have I clicked it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Works great so far ..no problems ..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.comment: Whoever said it doesn\'t work with Windows 8 is wrong as it\'s working fine for me! Very impressed with it and a great tool!
reviews.author: Russ Saunders

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: This is best app in own category....
reviews.author: Aditya Mishra

reviews.title: Whoa!
reviews.comment: Absolutely brilliant! It is very fast, no lag. Other apps like this are very sluggish. Also the profile support is a great feature, now I can use my phone as a VLC remote(the VLC app didn\'t work). I only wish it was possible to resize the keyboard in touch pad mode. That way it\'d be easy more practical.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid X2
reviews.comment: Almost perfect. Only thing I don\'t like is the keyboard. It\'s annoying and awkward. I want to be able to take advantage of the system keyboard instead.
reviews.author: Alex Parette

reviews.title: Almost great...
reviews.comment: The lack of a question mark on the keyboard is the only thing preventing me from buying the pro version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What I needed (almost)
reviews.comment: First, the bad points: the gPads make the app crash on my phone, which don\'t encourage me to buy the full version. I also couldn\'t find how to create/edit my own layouts, but I think this might be a paid-version-only thing.  However, all I wanted was a keyboard/mouse remote, and this does the job with very little hassle in setting up. The only part of this which I wasn\'t provided with (which is where this app lost a star) is that there is no Dvorak keyboard built-in, nor is there the option of using the one I already have installed on my phone.  I imagine the Dvorak problem is very simple to fix, so once that\'s done it\'ll definitely get a fifth star from me!
reviews.author: A Google User
